sentences: Belinda Metz (born January 4, 1960) is a Canadian solo recording artist from the early to mid-1980s who has since gone into acting.
In 1982 Metz released an independent album, The Minx, on Quantum Records.

Signed to a recording contract in 1985 with Attic Records, she released a full-length album, Electric Splash, which contained her only hit single, "What About Me", and won her a "Most Promising Female Vocalist" award from the U-Knows, CFNY's listener's choice awards. In 1985 Metz was severely injured in a car accident.
Recently, she had a role as Irene the band manager in the  Disney Channel Original Series So Weird.
